report.title: Square Details Per Year 3
report.description: Report displays a list of NPMS squares and next to each square is a list of columns displaying information about the square e.g. number of samples recorded in 2020. This version of the report has its earliest year set to 2020 for performance reasons.
report.query:
SELECT #columns# FROM locations l LEFT JOIN locations_websites lw on lw.location_id=l.id AND lw.deleted=false
LEFT JOIN location_attribute_values lavEx on lavEx.location_id=l.id AND lavEx.location_attribute_id=#excluded_square_attr_id# AND lavEx.deleted=false
LEFT JOIN locations plots on plots.parent_id=l.id AND plots.deleted=false
LEFT JOIN samples s20 on s20.location_id=plots.id AND s20.date_start >= '#2020_start_date#' AND s20.date_start < '#2021_start_date#' AND s20.survey_id in (#survey_ids#) AND s20.deleted=false AND s20.training=false LEFT JOIN samples s21 on s21.location_id=plots.id AND s21.date_start >= '#2021_start_date#' AND s21.date_start < '#2022_start_date#' AND s21.survey_id in (#survey_ids#) AND s21.deleted=false AND s21.training=false LEFT JOIN samples s22 on s22.location_id=plots.id AND s22.date_start >= '#2022_start_date#' AND s22.date_start < '#2023_start_date#' AND s22.survey_id in (#survey_ids#) AND s22.deleted=false AND s22.training=false
WHERE (l.location_type_id=#core_square_type_id#) AND #website_filter# AND l.deleted=false

param.name: ignore_square_dates_before
param.description: Ignore any squares created before this date. Useful if old squares are left on the system but are not currently active.

param.name: excluded_square_attr_id
param.description: Id of attribute that holds whether a square is excluded or not. If it is excluded then don't display on the map.

param.name: survey_ids
param.description: Comma separated list of survey ids to limit the results to.

column.name: excluded_square
column.sql: case when lavEx.id IS NOT NULL AND lavEX.int_value = 1 then 'Excluded' end
